TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebApplicationLifetimeEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 表示應用程式存留期中的重大事件。

span.span: Represents a significant event in the lifetime of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 應用程式存留期事件包含事件，例如應用程式啟動和關閉事件。Application lifetime events include events such as application startup and shutdown events. 如果應用程式終止時，您可以檢視相關的事件訊息欄位來判斷原因。If an application is terminated, you can determine why by viewing the related event message field. 當執行個體發生時，ASP.NET 健康監視更新的應用程式存留期事件效能計數器。When a instance occurs, ASP.NET health monitoring updates the Application Lifetime Events performance counter. 您可以記錄這些事件，藉由新增物件至`rules`的子區段`healthMonitoring`區段的組態檔中，如下列範例所示。You can log these events by adding the object to the `rules` subsection of the `healthMonitoring` section of the configuration file, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 應用程式存留期事件數效能計數器包含 ASP.NET 生命週期的所有事件總和。The Application Lifetime Events performance counter contains the sum total of all ASP.NET lifetime events. 若要檢視中的 系統監視器 (PerfMon)，此效能計數器**新增計數器**視窗中選取**ASP.NET**從**效能物件**下拉式清單。To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list. 選取 [**應用程式存留期事件**效能計數器，然後按一下**新增**] 按鈕。Select the **Application Lifetime Events** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱上的 「 使用系統監視器 (PerfMon)，以與 ASP.NET 應用程式 」 [MSDN](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information, see "Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications" on [MSDN](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118). 如果您允許標準所要記錄的事件，您可以檢視它們[事件檢視器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-server-2003/cc756915\(v=ws.10\))藉由選取**應用程式**記錄檔。If you allow events to be logged by the standard , you can view them in [Event Viewer](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-server-2003/cc756915\(v=ws.10\)) by selecting the **Application** log. > [!CAUTION] > 因為物件是大量的事件，其記錄需要大量資源，並可能會變慢您的系統。Because the object is a high-volume event, logging it is resource-intensive and might slow down your system. 它也可能會造成其他事件，來覆寫的情況類別因為大量的事件和方法的事件記錄的運作。It can also cause other events to be overwritten in the case of the class due to the high volume of events and the way the event logging works. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例的衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂的事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#1)] 下列組態檔摘錄會示範如何設定`healthMonitoring`區段的組態檔，以加入`SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent`上面定義 ASP.NET 健康監視系統來的程式碼。The following configuration-file excerpt shows how to configure the `healthMonitoring` section of a configuration file to add the `SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent` code defined above to the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 將事件新增至系統中，您必須藉由新增新的項目，來定義事件`eventMappings`區段，並對應至提供者的事件，藉由新增新項目`rules`一節。To add the event to the system, you must define the event by adding a new entry to the `eventMappings` section and map the event to a provider by adding a new entry to the `rules` section. ``` // Configure the connection between the // application lifetime event object // and the provider that must process it. ```

para.span: 格式化時顯示您自訂事件的資訊，覆寫方法而非方法。

span.span: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 這可避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.
ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 狀況監控系統是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來建立的執行個體類別，但您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己的事件類型繼承自這個類別時。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以呼叫建構函式，若是衍生自類別。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用ASP.NET 自訂健康情況事件中。The following code example shows how to use the in an ASP.NET custom health event. 此程式碼範例是主要被要顯示要使用的正確語法。This code example is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#2)]

span.span: ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 狀況監控系統是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來建立的執行個體類別，但您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己的事件類型繼承自這個類別時。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以呼叫建構函式，若是衍生自類別。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用ASP.NET 自訂健康情況事件中。The following code example shows how to use the in an ASP.NET custom health event. 此程式碼範例是主要被要顯示要使用的正確語法。This code example is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use.
